alert.note: Alert for Garfield; McCone; Prairie (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 3:05PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Garfield, southern Valley, western McCone and northwestern Prairie Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 304 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Jordan, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jordan, Hell Creek Rec Area, Flowing Wells Rest Area, Cohagen, Nelson Creek Rec Area, Rock Creek Rec Area, Brusett, Hillside, Haxby, Weldon, Van Norman and Watkins. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM MDT for northeastern Montana.
